title: GPT-5 System Card
raw_excerpt: This GPT-5 system card explains how a unified model routing system powers fast and smart responses using gpt-5-main, gpt-5-thinking, and lightweight versions like gpt-5-thinking-nano, optimized for different tasks and developer use.
raw_body: This GPT-5 system card explains how a unified model routing system powers fast and smart responses using gpt-5-main, gpt-5-thinking, and lightweight versions like gpt-5-thinking-nano, optimized for different tasks and developer use.
speedrun: The GPT-5 system card introduces a unified model routing system that enhances response speed and intelligence by utilizing various versions, including gpt-5-main and gpt-5-thinking-nano. This innovation allows developers to select the most suitable model for specific tasks, significantly improving efficiency and user experience in AI applications.
why_it_matters: This unified model routing system enables developers to optimize AI performance for diverse applications, leading to faster and more accurate responses that can enhance user engagement.

By offering lightweight versions like gpt-5-thinking-nano, the system reduces resource consumption, making advanced AI capabilities accessible to smaller businesses and developers with limited infrastructure.

lenses.eli12: The new GPT-5 system helps computers answer questions faster and smarter. It has different versions for different jobs, which is exciting because it means better help for everyone using AI.
lenses.pm: Developers across industries will use this system to create more efficient AI applications. It solves the problem of slow responses and high resource usage, giving businesses a competitive edge while minimizing operational costs.
lenses.engineer: The architecture employs a unified routing mechanism that dynamically selects the appropriate model based on task requirements. While this enhances performance, it may face challenges in model compatibility and resource allocation, particularly for complex tasks.
